template.name: IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6
template.description: Template for wireless IntelliMon sensor, firmware 1.6.

item.name: Dew point [C]
item.description: Calculated dew point in degrees Celsius.

item.name: Equivalent carbon-dioxide eCO2 [ppm]
item.description: eCO2 (equivalent calculated carbon-dioxide) concentration within a range of 400 to 8192 parts per million (ppm).

item.name: Error: Environment sensor
item.description: Number of failed environment sensor readings.

item.name: Error: IAQ details
item.description: Status of internal sensor reading. Only useful if iaderror is > 0.

item.name: IAQ heating time [sec]
item.description: Time to heat-up the IAQ sensor before a valid measurement can be taken. Changes to this values have a strong impact on iad readings and battery lifetime.

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: Brownout detected
trigger.description: Brownout detected. The supply voltage was below the critical threshold and caused the device to reset. This usually means the battery is nearly empty or there are issues with the power supply.

item.name: WiFi RSSI [dBm]
item.description: The received WiFi field strength of the connected access point in dBm.

item.name: Connect time server [sec]
item.description: The time it takes to connect to the Zabbix server.

item.name: Sensor data
item.description: Master item that receives the raw JSON strings.

item.name: Serial number
item.description: The serial number of the device, which is also part of the MAC address.

item.name: Fails: Sensors
item.description: Number of failed readings of any sensor.

item.name: Temperature [C]
item.description: Temperature in degrees Celsius for the internal sensor.

item.name: Temperature external [C]
item.description: Temperature in degrees Celsius for the external sensor.

item.name: Error: Temperature external
item.description: Number of failed readings of the external temperature sensor.

item.name: Total volatile organic compound TVOC [ppb]
item.description: TVOC (total volatile organic compound) concentration within a range of 0 to 1187 parts per billion (ppb).

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: VCC low [<3.00V]
trigger.description: Current input is below 3V. Power supply or battery is too weak.

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: Version of the currently installed firmware.

item.name: Build information
item.description: Build information of the currently installed firmware.

item.name: Wakeup reason
item.description: Wakeup reason: 0=Wakeup by power-on, reset 3=Wakeup by modeKey 4=Wakeup by timer

item.name: Connect time WiFi AP [sec]
item.description: The time it takes to connect to the WiFi AP.

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: WiFi AP long connection time [>10sec]
trigger.description: WiFi AP has a connection time of over 10 seconds.

item.name: Fails: WiFi
item.description: Number of failed WiFi AP connection attempts.

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: Recent connect to WiFi AP failed
trigger.description: The last connection to WiFi AP failed.

resource.name: IMS-Smart Sensor: Total volatile organic compound TVOC graph L
IMS-Smart Sensor: Equivalent carbon-dioxide eCO2 graph

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: Temperature below dew point
trigger.description: The dew point is the temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor. The temperature is below that dew point. This means the device is exposed to condensation, which could damage it.

trigger.expression: {IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:dew.last()}+2>{IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:temp.last()} or {IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:dew.last()}+2>{IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:tempe.last()}
trigger.recovery_expression: {IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:dew.last()}+3<{IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:temp.last()} or {IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:dew.last()}+3<{IMS-Smart Sensor v1.6:tempe.last()}
trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] - Sensor: Temperature near dew point
trigger.description: The dew point is the temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor. The temperature is near the dew point. This means the device soon will be exposed to condensation, which could damage it.

graph.name: IMS-Smart Sensor: Equivalent carbon-dioxide eCO2 graph
IMS-Smart Sensor: Equivalent carbon-dioxide eCO2 graph L
IMS-Smart Sensor: Total volatile organic compound TVOC graph
IMS-Smart Sensor: Total volatile organic compound TVOC graph L
IMS-Smart Sensor: WiFi RSSI [dBm] graph L
